title: fira android. signatura android
creator: carlosarquitecte
content:
Hola. Me gustaria poder tener una forma html o insertar imájenes en mi firma de correo de thunderbird para android. ¿COmo lo hago?

Hello.

I would like to know if it's possible to use an HTML signatura o instert inages into signatura in android thunderbird. Is there any way to achieve this, or any recommended alternative?

Thank you in advanced for your help

title: Where are the rich text formatting controls when composing a new message?
creator: flymike
content: Using Thunderbird for Android on a Chromebook, I can't see any text formatting controls in the Compose window. Like bold, lists, etc. I've tried in Portait, Landscape, and Resizeable.
